notes: Might be the first one in here for February? I know someone got KoG in December with this deck. Used it on my whole climb. Solemn-Stein. Would run regular Kuriboh's instead of Sphere, but I barely got in the game in time to get Arkana, and wasn't able to get any. The cheese is real.
